name: Double Cross (itch)
description:
bulit in 2015-IndieAce-GameJam of China

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

[GamePlay]:

In a distant space-station

an Extreme Explorer item

Energy-Device be activted for accidental....

Aliens flooded into here...

Defeat Them! Avoid Teammate-Damage!

Then Live on!

[ Instructions ] ：

1p move：WASD

Super-Lazer-activate: 'Q'

2p move：up/down/left/right-arrow

Super-Lazer-activate: 'Enter'
